codedcit.switch.model: Switch to the large model currently in use.
codedcit.auto.completion: Whether or not to automatically trigger completion when typing.
codedcit.delay.time: The delay in seconds before automatic code completion triggers.
codedcit.completion.max.tokens: Maximum number of tokens for which suggestions will be displayed
codedcit.chat.max.tokens: Maximum number of tokens for which chat messages will be displayed
